item.title: Famitsu Sales: 2/24/25 – 2/30/25
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/famitsu-sales-2-24-25-2-30-25

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Monster Hunter Wilds opens at 601,179 retail sales.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the week of February 24, 2025 to February 30, 2025.

Monster Hunter Wilds for PlayStation 5 was the highest selling new release of the week, opening at 601,179 retail sales.

Other new releases to chart in the top 10 include Yu-Gi-Oh! Early Days Collection for Switch, which opened at 49,862 retail sales, and Wizardry: The Five Ordeals for Switch, which opened at 11,299 retail sales.

On the hardware side, the PlayStation 5 family sold 108,978 units, the Switch family sold 45,189 units, the Xbox Series family sold 721 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 20 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [PS5] Monster Hunter Wilds (Capcom, 02/28/25) – 601,179 (New)
  2. [NSW] Yu-Gi-Oh! Early Days Collection (Konami, 02/27/25) – 49,862 (New)
  3. [NSW] Wizardry: The Five Ordeals (G*Spark Publishing, 02/27/25) – 11,299 (New)
  4. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 10,746 (1,209,807)
  5. [NSW] Donkey Kong Country Returns HD (Nintendo, 01/16/25) – 10,418 (216,581)
  6. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 10,062 (6,269,164)
  7. [PS5] Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii (SEGA, 02/21/25) – 9,389 (77,608)
  8. [PS4] Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii (SEGA, 02/21/25) – 7,545 (44,487)
  9. [NSW] Okayu Nyumu! (Entergram, 02/27/25) – 5,932 (New)
  10. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 5,047 (3,820,765)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on March 7.

  1. [PS5] Cladun X3 (Nippon Ichi Software, 02/27/25) – (New)
  2. [PS4] Cladun X3 (Nippon Ichi Software, 02/27/25) – (New)
  3. [NSW] Cladun X3 (Nippon Ichi Software, 02/27/25) – (New)
  4. [PS5] CRYSTAR (FuRyu, 02/27/25) – (New)
  5. [NSW] Fuyuzono Sacrifice (Idea Factory, 02/27/25) – (New)
  6. [NSW] Utawarerumono Trilogy Set (Aquaplus, 02/27/25) – (New)
  7. [NSW] Re;quartz Reido (PROTOTYPE, 02/27/25) – (New)
  8. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) –
  9. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) –
  10. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) –
  11. [NSW] It Takes Two (Electronic Arts, 12/08/22) –
  12. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  13. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  14. [NSW] Super Mario Bros. Wonder (Nintendo, 10/20/23) –
  15. [NSW] Ring Fit Adventure (Nintendo, 10/18/19) –
  16. [NSW] Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 11/14/24) –
  17. [PS5] Dynasty Warriors: Origins (Koei Tecmo, 01/17/25) –
  18. [NSW] Super Mario Odyssey (Nintendo, 10/27/17) –
  19. [NSW] Splatoon 3 (Nintendo, 09/09/22) –
  20. [NSW] Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics (Nintendo, 06/05/20) –
  21. [NSW] Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 Special Price (SEGA, 11/18/22) –
  22. [NSW] The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Nintendo, 03/03/17) –
  23. [NSW] Pikmin 4 (Nintendo, 07/21/23) –
  24. [NSW] Urban Myth Dissolution Center (Shueisha Games, 02/13/25) –

  32. [NSW] Monster Hunter Rise + Sunbreak Set Best Price (Capcom, 11/16/23) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. PlayStation 5 – 75,070 (5,550,115)
  2. Switch OLED Model – 30,112 (8,827,863)
  3. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 26,362 (944,104)
  4. Switch Lite – 11,094 (6,473,891)
  5. PlayStation 5 Pro – 7,546 (172,238)

  9. Xbox Series X – 35 (319,519)
  10. PlayStation 4 – 20 (7,929,295)

item.title: 9 Years of Shadows coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, and Xbox One in Q2 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/9-years-of-shadows-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-and-xbox-one-in-q2-2025

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Side-scrolling Metroidvania game published by JanduSoft.

Publisher JanduSoft and developer Halberd Studios will release side-scrolling Metroidvania game 9 Years of Shadows for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One in Q2 2025 for $19.99 / €19.99, the companies announced.

9 Years of Shadows first launched for PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on March 27, 2023, followed by Switch on November 9, 2023, and iOS and Android on November 21, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

For nine long years, the world has been submerged in the deepest of shadows, robbing every object and living creature of their color. Once a thriving civilization, the people have forgotten the warmth of the sun, the joy of laughter and the promise of a prosperous future.

Many brave souls have tried to venture inside the corrupting depths of Talos Castle, a long-abandoned orphanage from which the curse stemmed, but with each futile attempt, resignation became the daily fare for the people, all hope lost. Except for one person.

Armed with little other than her halberd and sheer nerve, Europa‘s daunting quest is clear: enter the castle, find the source of darkness, and return color to the lands before it is too late.

End the Curse

Set forth to a life-changing voyage. Take on the role of Europa and brave the amazing halls of Talos Castle as you uncover the disturbing truth of its inhabitants’ fate. A moving coming-of-age tale that stresses the importance of embracing our feelings in order to heal. Embark on a journey of friendship, where Europa and her loyal companion Apino learn to rely on each other to overcome any obstacle and help others along the way.

  • Meet memorable and enigmatic characters.
  • Find the remnants of ancient civilizations.
  • Enter gateways that speak echoes of the past.

Restore the World Through Music

With an entrancing and soothing soundtrack tuned to 432Hz composed by Michiru Yamane (Castlevania franchise) and ​Norihiko Hibino ​(Metal Gear Solid franchise), healing music plays a major role in both gameplay and narrative.

  • Collect musical notes and improve your abilities.
  • Perform quests for the composers and their orchestra at Teatro Degollado.
  • Decode enemy attack patterns through music.

Master the Elements

Encounter countless foes on the path to victory, each one as impressive as they are deadly. But with the right elemental armor, Europa and Apino are a force to be reckoned with.

  • Strategically switch between your elemental armors to gain dominance over the various creatures that lurk in the shadows.
  • Harness the power of Poseidon, Gaia, and Helios to solve puzzles as well as gain access to otherwise inaccessible locations to defeat giant bosses in classic Metroidvania fashion.

Explore a Stunning Pixel Art World

Scout the vivid setting of Talos Castle, where colorful characters, awe-striking architecture of ancient peoples, and otherworldly paintings await those courageous enough to seek them. Inside, the enemies that dwell within are as beautiful as they are deadly, a mixture of biological and mechanical parts ready to strike. Explore the map to find treasure, hand-crafted scenery, and ancient secrets worthy of a hero.

  • Explore a timeworn mechanical giant shrouded in corruption.
  • Battle hidden bosses with an intuitive combat system.
  • Scavenge collectibles and dive deeper into Talos’ lore.
  • Gain power ups that grant Europa and Apino unparalleled combat potential.
  • Combine melee prowess with ranged spirit magic to cleanse the corrupted world.

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation and Xbox Announce Trailer

item.title: Wizardry Variants Daphne for PC now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/wizardry-variants-daphne-for-pc-now-available

The PC version of free-to-play 3D dungeon RPG Wizardry Variants Daphne is now available via Steam, publisher Drecom and developer Studio 2PRO announced It supports English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese support has also been added to the previously released iOS and Android versions.

Get the latest details below.

■ Steam Version and Chinese (Traditional / Simplified) Release Celebration! Get 2,000 Gems of Org!

The Steam version of Wizardry Variants Daphne has officially launched on Thursday, March 6, 2025!

The Steam version supports landscape mode (1920×1080px), controller support, and cross-platform account linking for iOS and Android users, allowing seamless gameplay between PC and mobile. Additionally, Simplified and Traditional Chinese language options have been newly added across all platforms, making the game accessible to even more players.

To celebrate, we are giving away 2,000 Gems of Org to all players. Be sure to claim yours!

We will continue working hard to bring you even more exciting content and features in the future. Thank you for your continued support!

■ Steam Release Celebration! Legendary Adventurer Wanderer Princess Lanaville Returns for a Limited Time!

[Reminiscence] Wanderer Princess Lanavaille

  • Event Period: March 6, 2025 to April 2, 2025 at 23:59 JST

To celebrate the release of the PC version, Wanderer Princess Lanavaille, the alternate style of Lanavaille, makes a return!

Wanderer Princess Lanavaille will be available for a limited time from:

  • [Reminiscence] Unique Remains: Wanderer Princess Knight (with bonus)
  • [Reminiscence] Unique Remains: Wanderer Princess Knight
  • [Reminiscence] Remains of the Wandering Princess of Battle and Love

*These are different from the previously released Wanderer Princess Knight Lanavaille items.

Please see the in-game announcement for details.

■ Limited Time Quest Pixie and the Secret Garden Now Live!

  • Event Period: March 6, 2025 to March 19, 2025 at 23:59 JST

Pixie and the Secret Garden is a limited time quest where you can experience an exclusive story.

By taking on the Save My Friend request at the Adventurer’s Guild in the Royal Capital Luknalia, you will embark on a journey set in the Cave of Flowers.

*The above request can be unlocked after reaching a certain point of the Beginning Dungeon and pressing the event button. This will begin the event story prologue, after which you can accept the request at the Adventurer’s Guild in the Royal Capital Luknalia.

Notable equipment:

  • Mauve Shield
    • Properties: Confusion Tolerance

Pixie and the Secret Garden Missions

  • Event Period: March 6, 2025 to March 19, 2025 at 23:59 JST

These are special missions in which you can obtain luxurious items, such as Codex of Learning, Adventurer’s Remains, up to 400 Gems of Org, and more by completing the designated missions and obtaining a certain number of points during the event period.

The Pixie and the Secret Garden Special Supplies

  • Event Period: March 6, 2025 to March 19, 2025 at 23:59 JST

Log in during the event period to receive various supplies, such as Adventurer’s Remains, and up to 400 Gems of Org.

You can claim the rewards from Adventurer’s Guild –> Supplies –> Special Supplies.

*You can claim up to seven days worth of unclaimed rewards at once during the event period.

■ About Wizardry Variants Daphne

Story

Once every 100 years, the Abyss opens. It is a curse of death that consumes the continent. A Warlock who coveted Death, devoured people and animals and enveloped the world in despair. For thousands of years the line of kings has sealed the Abyss. But now, the king has vanished, and the world is being consumed by death, moment by moment. Resistance itself is meaningless. There is naught but to perish.

Overview

Wizardry Variants Daphne is a 3D dungeon RPG, a completely new addition to the Wizardry series. The game system follows the play cycle of the traditional 3D dungeon RPGs, with players progressing deeper into dungeons called Abyss, by repeatedly getting stronger, resupplying in towns, and battling and collecting items in dungeons. Battles with enemies proceed in a command battle system, and a formation of up to six characters, including the player, can enjoy highly strategic battles that make full use of spells and skills.
